reviews.review: Thanks to this game, my low blood pressure is cured.
good game allowed me to locate a girlfriend

this game is a very fun asymmetrical horror that lets you work as a team to escape the killer or lets you kill a group of survivors who need to escape. 

This game is tons of fun if you don't take it too seriously. Just have fun with it and dont play for too long in a row ;)

Ебаная Игра!Хуй найдёшь игру Когда Играешь За Маньяка!!!я сука 2ч СИДЕЛ!!!!!а Потом Решил зайти за Выживших ..так СРАЗУ ИГРА НАШЛАСЬ ДАЖЕ 1сек!не Прошло!!!Ублюдина а не игра!!!

La verdad, no lo recomiendo, es una total mierda, desequilibrio enorme, asesinos focuseros y demasiada ventaja, imposible escaparse de él, una total cagada de mono, TE CAMPEAN EL GANCHO SIENDO 4 PERSONAS VIVAS, si son 2, te entiendo, PERO 4, chupate una pija, juego choto!

I honestly suggest you look for a different game, or maybe try one of the other horror games out there.  If you play this and find it fun, cherish those times.  Eventually you'll start to see the flaws and things about this game that are honestly infuriating.  I wish I could upvote this game, but it's contributed nothing but bad vibes.

Es un juego de mierda, es desequilibrado, es muy facil para el asesino, no tenes manera de defenderte, siempre te termina matando, tarda mucho en encontrar partida, la verdad AGUANTE VIERNES 13, mil veces mejor.
老早就入手了，一直没怎么玩，但是不妨碍是我心中最好的非对称对抗
one of the best games ever

I love this game, every time there's an update it needs to slowly apply the patch to all 35 GB of the game.

For example, just now I had a 73 MB update. But for me to play the game I have to wait for it to reformat or whatever it does to the game for all 35 GB of it. This takes forever and I have to leave my computer on for 1-2 hours for it to finish.
Developers make it fairly obvious that this is a survivor oriented game and with every update and balancing adjustment.
Something about this game makes me keep wanting to play it, even if I have a unfun match; so pretty much yes a good game
Отличная игрулька. Я просто в восторге! Интересный геймплей и персонажи, навыки помогающие играть, прикольная система прокачки, самое главное - локализация. Игра стоит своих денег!

我真几把服了，网络不好，我玩6天了，天天有几把网络不好，存档没了，今天连续两局，第二把，我爬地窖走的，你妈的，知道老子爬出去多高兴吗，你给来一句网络不好，存档没了。我草你妈
 
麻痹，真香呗，还得开加速器，我的钱啊
这游戏对血压很有帮助

The Survivors Rulebook for Killers (3.1.2 Edition)

Rule #1 : The Killer is always wrong. No exceptions.

Rule #2 : The Survivors are always right. No exceptions.

Rule #3 : The Killer is always overbuffed. No exceptions.

Rule #4 : The Survivor is always overnerfed. No exceptions.

Rule #5 : The Killer is not allowed to DC (disconnect) in matches

Rule #6 : The Survivors are allowed to DC (Disconnect) in matches when certain conditions are met. When that happens, see rule #48.

Rule #7 : Under no circumstances may the Killer dodge or leave the lobby. It will be considered as DC (Disconnecting). No exceptions.

Rule #8: As soon as the match starts, the Killer must announce who they are by whatever means necessary.

Rule #9 : The Killer must ALWAYS let the last Survivor exit through the hatch.

Rule #14 : If the Killer is successfully pallet-looped by the chased Survivor, the Killer can henceforth be referred to as an Idiot and deserves everything they get.

Rule #22 : The Killer cannot interrupt a survivor healing another survivor. It is unfair.

Rule #23 : The Killer cannot interrupt a survivor mending or healing themselves. It is unfair.

Rule #30: If it glows, it goes. No exceptions.

Rule #39 : Any Killer that finds a Survivor within the first minute of the game can henceforth be referred to as a Hacker and deserves everything they get. No exceptions.

Rule #48 : Killers must let all remaining Survivors escape if one or more Survivors have left the match prematurely. No exceptions.

Rule #53 : Any Killer that enters within a 25 meters range of a hooked Survivor can henceforth be referred to as a Camper and deserves everything they get. No exceptions.

Rule #54.a : After hooking a Survivor, the Killer must immediately leave the area and stand in a corner, EVEN if they see another survivor and/or scratch marks at the Hook. No exceptions.

Rule #54.b : It is then mandatory for the Killer to start staring at a wall for a minimum duration of 30 second.

Rule #55 : The Killer may NEVER chase after and/or attack a Survivor that has been previously hooked until they have hooked another survivor. No exceptions.

Rule #56 : Any Killer that chases someone he has already injured, hooked, or used an ability on before, can henceforth be referred to as a Tunneler and deserves everthing they get. No exceptions.

Rule #106.a : Whenever a Killer sees a group of Survivors around a generator, the Killer must only chase the uninjured ones.

Rule #106.b : If all Survivors are uninjured, the killer will only chase the Survivor stepping forward to start a looping.

Rule #106.c : If all Survivors are injured, the Killer must run in the middle and scatter them. After that they shall spend a minimum of 5 seconds without moving before deciding who to follow.

Rule #456 : When in a looping chase, the Killer should NEVER take advantage of a Survivor that makes a mistake.

Rule #458 : When being baited by a flashlight or loud sounds, the Killer must always play along.

Sustos, persecuciones,asesinos despiadados... ES UN JUEGOTE

サバイバー側は良ゲー
キラー側はクソゲー

今さら言うまでもないですが、サバイバーが楽しむためにキラーが理不尽な戦いを強いられて悔しい思いをするというのがこのゲームの日常。運営は「キラーはサバイバーを殺すことを目的とせず散歩感覚で～」的な事を言ってますが、目標を高く持つことが罪ですか？
それでも私のような、ごく一部の物好きがキラーをプレイしてしまうのは、さながら悪い女にハマった童貞くんのよう。課金もめちゃくちゃした。
その他にもバグが多い、新キラー実装のペースが早すぎる等、不満が尽きません。似たようなゲームがPCやCSでできればすぐにでも浮気したい
vai toma no cu jogo de merda

Brilliant, and addicting gameplay that never gets old.
Heart pounding moments of suspense and fear envelope you as you struggle to escape. 
Detailed, and personalized perks for each killer and survivor. You will want to try them all.
Fun game.
Whenever something bad happens in-game, I can assure myself it's either that my teammates are horrible or the killer is toxic and uses broken mechanics.
Otimo jogo para passar raiva com os amigos
mano eu to tão visiado que eu posso jogar esse jogo por literalmente  24h por dia
jogo muito bom adorei mas o jogo e muito filha da puta e da mais vantagem para os assassinos meio bosta

Sometimes its good sometimes its not. Play the game and learn playing both sides so you don't get burnt out. The first while on either side you will be confused and not doing well, but once you get better at the game it becomes a lot more fun and actually skill based. GG

The people to play this game either have the mental capacity of a turnip that has been deep fried and don't understand what a skill check is or have figured out how, to the tiniest pixel, ruin your entire life whether you're playing killer or survivor. Then, after all of that, it doesn't matter if it was a sweaty SOB or a baby killer, they will proceed to tell you how you don't know how to play and will report you for unsportsmanlike behavior cause of that one time you made them drop a survivor using a pallet. Not to mention how BHVR has the collective brain power of a Huntress body pillow and decide that nerfing everything until the game isn't fun is the way to go.

Can't get enough of the game, 10/10.
ta bueno como para chillear con amigos, si tryhardeas te salen canas

I played the Beta for this, so Ive seen all the ups and downs this game has had. Now a days its mostly downs. The only reason this even gets play time with me anymore is to play with friends who are on console. Once VHS and Prop Hunt go console and are cross compatible, or they get PCS whatever comes first, we will all be dropping this. See ya.
otimo jogo ele sempre me alegra

What even is the matchmaking? You either stomp your opponent, or get stomped. There is no in between at all, every single match for months have been completely one sided. The last match went horribly for me, blowing up gens and making mistakes but even then the killer stood no chance at counter looping. Like that wasn't fun... I don't like getting destroyed, and destroying a newer player doesn't give any sense of accomplishment. Give us real matchmaking for the love of the fog...

After putting in 1700 hours on Xbox, I switched to Steam and continue to have a blast in this game. It's a great game to sit back and play with your friends and just have some good old fashioned fun. The huge library of characters to choose from is impressive and includes a true hall of fame of horror icons. From Freddy Kruger and Leatherface to Pyramid Head and Nemesis, they have 'em all. 

As you've probably seen, this game sadly gets review bombed from time to time, and flocks of entitled players come in here and smack talk the game just because the devs didn't chnage something they wanted changed right this second. Don't let that sway you from at least giving it a shot. Is the game perfect? Certainly not. Is it hella fun? Absolutely. Give it a shot, I promise its better than the keyboard warriors on dbdtwt try to say it is.
